languages.text: "Меня волнует не то, что ваша помощница мутант. Куда больше меня тревожит, что она им не окажется". {n}Хейнрикс поворачивается к вам.{/n} "{name}? Я бы хотел незамедлительно познакомиться с помощницей губернатора Вьятт. Из профессионального интереса".

"I am not concerned that your aide is a mutant. I am far more concerned that she may be nothing of the sort." {n}Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "{name}? I would like to meet this helper of Governor Vyatt's without delay. Out of professional interest."
languages.original_text: "Меня волнует не то, что ваша помощница мутант. Куда больше меня тревожит, что она им не окажется". {n}Хейнрикс поворачивается к вам.{/n} "{name}? Я бы хотел незамедлительно познакомиться с помощницей губернатора Вьятт. Из профессионального интереса".

traits.locale_text: "I am not concerned that your aide is a mutant. I am far more concerned that she may be nothing of the sort." {n}Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "{name}? I would like to meet this helper of Governor Vyatt's without delay. Out of professional interest."

"I am not concerned that your aide is a mutant. I am far more concerned that she may be nothing of the sort." {n}Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "{name}? I would like to meet this helper of Governor Vyatt's without delay. Out of professional interest."

"I am not concerned that your aide is a mutant. I am far more concerned that she may be nothing of the sort." {n}Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "{name}? I would like to meet this helper of Governor Vyatt's without delay. Out of professional interest."

"I am not concerned that your aide is a mutant. I am far more concerned that she may be nothing of the sort." {n}Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "{name}? I would like to meet this helper of Governor Vyatt's without delay. Out of professional interest."

languages.text: “我担心的并不是你的助手可能是变种人。我真正担心的是，她可能根本不是什么变种人。”{n}海因里希转向了你。{/n}“{name}？出于职业兴趣，我希望能尽快与维亚特总督这位助手见个面。”
languages.original_text: "I am not concerned that your aide is a mutant. I am far more concerned that she may be nothing of the sort." {n}Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "{name}? I would like to meet this helper of Governor Vyatt's without delay. Out of professional interest."

traits.locale_text: “我担心的并不是你的助手可能是变种人。我真正担心的是，她可能根本不是什么变种人。”{n}海因里希转向了你。{/n}“{name}？出于职业兴趣，我希望能尽快与维亚特总督这位助手见个面。”

languages.text: «No me preocupa que su ayudante sea una mutante. Me preocupa mucho más la posibilidad de que no lo sea». {n}Heinrix se gira hacia ti.{/n} «¿{name}? Me gustaría reunirme con la ayudante de la gobernadora Vyatt cuanto antes. Llamémoslo interés profesional».
languages.original_text: "I am not concerned that your aide is a mutant. I am far more concerned that she may be nothing of the sort." {n}Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "{name}? I would like to meet this helper of Governor Vyatt's without delay. Out of professional interest."

traits.locale_text: «No me preocupa que su ayudante sea una mutante. Me preocupa mucho más la posibilidad de que no lo sea». {n}Heinrix se gira hacia ti.{/n} «¿{name}? Me gustaría reunirme con la ayudante de la gobernadora Vyatt cuanto antes. Llamémoslo interés profesional».

languages.text: 「総督の側近が変異体だというのはどうでもいいことです。それよりはるかに心配なのは、彼女がそんなものですらない可能性があるということです」{n}ハインリックスがこちらを向く。{/n}「{name}さん？ただちに件のビャット総督の協力者に会わせてください。仕事上、興味があるのです」
languages.original_text: "I am not concerned that your aide is a mutant. I am far more concerned that she may be nothing of the sort." {n}Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "{name}? I would like to meet this helper of Governor Vyatt's without delay. Out of professional interest."

traits.locale_text: 「総督の側近が変異体だというのはどうでもいいことです。それよりはるかに心配なのは、彼女がそんなものですらない可能性があるということです」{n}ハインリックスがこちらを向く。{/n}「{name}さん？ただちに件のビャット総督の協力者に会わせてください。仕事上、興味があるのです」

languages.text: "Mich beunruhigt nicht, dass Eure Helferin eine Mutantin ist. Mich beunruhigt viel mehr, dass sie es möglicherweise nicht ist." {n}Heinrix wendet sich dir zu.{/n} "{name}? Ich möchte diese Helferin von Gouverneurin Vyatt unverzüglich kennenlernen. Aus beruflichem Interesse."
languages.original_text: "I am not concerned that your aide is a mutant. I am far more concerned that she may be nothing of the sort." {n}Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "{name}? I would like to meet this helper of Governor Vyatt's without delay. Out of professional interest."

traits.locale_text: "Mich beunruhigt nicht, dass Eure Helferin eine Mutantin ist. Mich beunruhigt viel mehr, dass sie es möglicherweise nicht ist." {n}Heinrix wendet sich dir zu.{/n} "{name}? Ich möchte diese Helferin von Gouverneurin Vyatt unverzüglich kennenlernen. Aus beruflichem Interesse."

languages.text: « Libre à vous de recourir à l'aide d'une mutante. Ce qui me préoccupe, c'est qu'il y a de grandes chances que vous vous mépreniez sur la nature de celle-ci. {name} ? {n}continue Heinrix en se tournant vers vous.{/n} J'aimerais rencontrer l'aide de la gouverneure Vyatt sans tarder. Pur intérêt professionnel. »
languages.original_text: "I am not concerned that your aide is a mutant. I am far more concerned that she may be nothing of the sort." {n}Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "{name}? I would like to meet this helper of Governor Vyatt's without delay. Out of professional interest."

traits.locale_text: « Libre à vous de recourir à l'aide d'une mutante. Ce qui me préoccupe, c'est qu'il y a de grandes chances que vous vous mépreniez sur la nature de celle-ci. {name} ? {n}continue Heinrix en se tournant vers vous.{/n} J'aimerais rencontrer l'aide de la gouverneure Vyatt sans tarder. Pur intérêt professionnel. »

languages.text: "Emir erinizin bir mutant olmasından değil, olmamasından endişeleniyorum ben daha çok." {n}Heinrix sana dönüyor.{/n} "{name}, Vali Vyatt'ın bu yardımcısı ile vakit kaybetmeden görüşmek isterim. Mesleki bir ilgi."
languages.original_text: "I am not concerned that your aide is a mutant. I am far more concerned that she may be nothing of the sort." {n}Heinrix turns to you.{/n} "{name}? I would like to meet this helper of Governor Vyatt's without delay. Out of professional interest."

traits.locale_text: "Emir erinizin bir mutant olmasından değil, olmamasından endişeleniyorum ben daha çok." {n}Heinrix sana dönüyor.{/n} "{name}, Vali Vyatt'ın bu hizmetkârı ile vakit kaybetmeden görüşmek istiyorum. Mesleki bir ilgi."
